name: Pip Panic!
description:
In Pip Panic!, your goal is to survive for as long as you can from an endless wave of enemies. Purchase skill cards that are drawn randomly into your skill slots. Use the skills to improve your survival, and aim for the hi-score!

This game is the completed version of Pip The Gladiator prototype. It has been 8 long grueling months of coding (rewriting codebase from scratch twice, redesiging the game 3 times, and struggling to create assets, finding audio/vfx...) but we're finally done and ready to ship to iOS!

Design: LWY & Mok

Programming: LWY (http://wyleong.tumblr.com | http://twitter.com/laxa88)
Art: LWY & Mok (http://monosattva.tumblr.com | http://twitter.com/kidomok)
Animation - Wilmer Lee
UI Art - Ashly Teoh
Background Art - Anson Tan
Skill Card Art - Nadirah Sakri
